bibl.title: The Persea Tree from Alexander to Late Antiquity. A Contribution to the Cultural and Social History of Greco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Tracking Egyptian traditions behind the Greek persea. - 2. Alexander, Perseus and the Ptolemies: from Memphis to Alexandria. - 3. Persea and Egyptian religion in the Greco-Roman period: continuity and change. - 4. Cults in their social and political context: persea in O.G.I.S. I, 97. - 5. Egyptian sacred landscape up until Late Antiquity. - Avec résumé en anglais.
